about.title: About English AI Tutor
about.subtitle: Your personal AI-powered English learning companion, available 24/7

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: We're revolutionizing English language learning through cutting-edge AI technology. Our platform provides instant, personalized feedback and adapts to your learning style in real-time.
mission.description2: Whether you're a beginner or advanced learner, our AI tutor helps you master English through natural conversations, grammar exercises, and pronunciation practice.

affordability.title: Excellence Meets Affordability
affordability.description: We believe that exceptional education shouldn't be limited by financial barriers. By harnessing the power of AI technology, we're proud to offer premium learning resources at a fraction of traditional tutoring costs. Our mission is to democratize high-quality English education, making it accessible to learners worldwide.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our AI English tutoring service

howWorks.question: How does AI tutoring work?
howWorks.answer: Our AI tutoring system uses advanced natural language processing to engage in real-time conversations with students. It adapts to your learning style, provides personalized feedback, and helps you practice English in a natural, conversational way.

levels.question: What levels of English proficiency do you support?
levels.answer: We support all levels from beginner (A1) to advanced (C2). Our AI system automatically adjusts its language complexity and teaching style to match your current level and helps you progress gradually.

cost.question: How much does it cost?
cost.answer: Our pricing scheme is 9.9RMB per hour. So everyone can afford it.

trial.question: Can I try it before subscribing?
trial.answer: Yes! We offer a free trial period where you can experience our AI tutoring system and evaluate if it's right for you. No credit card is required for the trial.

topics.question: What topics can I practice?
topics.answer: You can practice a wide range of topics including everyday conversation, business English, academic English, IELTS/TOEFL preparation, and specific industry vocabulary. Our AI tutor can adapt to any topic you're interested in.

availability.question: Is the AI available 24/7?
availability.answer: Yes, our AI tutor is available 24/7, allowing you to practice English at any time that suits your schedule, from anywhere in the world.

progress.question: How do you track progress?
progress.answer: We provide detailed analytics of your learning journey, including vocabulary growth, grammar improvement, speaking confidence, and overall proficiency level. You can view your progress in your dashboard.

speaking.question: Can I practice speaking and pronunciation?
speaking.answer: Yes, our AI system can analyze your pronunciation and provide real-time feedback to help you improve your speaking skills. You can practice through voice conversations with the AI tutor.

stillHaveQuestions.description: Still have questions? We're here to help.
